sources.title: Groom Wore Spurs, The
sources.description: From Imdb; Lawyer Ginger Rogers is hired to keep dumb cowboy Jack Carson out of trouble. Stars: Ginger Rogers, Jack Carson and Joan Davis

sources.title: The Groom Wore Spurs (1951) GINGER ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Jack Carson, Ginger Rogers, Joan Davis
Director: Richard Whorf

Slapstick comedy about a singing cowboy who cannot sing or ride, and the lady lawyer who falls in love with him and is determined to make him a real cowboy!

sources.title: The Groom Wore Spurs (1951) Ginger Rogers | Western Comedy Movie
sources.description:
An attorney is hired to keep a dumb cowboy out of trouble.

Director: Richard Whorf
Writers: Robert Libott, Frank Burt 
Stars: Ginger Rogers, Jack Carson, Joan Davis
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Western

metadata.Plot: Actor Ben Castle is a phony singing cowboy who can not ride, sing, or act, and is afraid of guns and horses and the first one out the door when trouble breaks out. His studio hires attorney Abigail Furnival, to get him out of trouble with a big-time gambler because he can not pay off a gambling debt. And the next thing she knows is that she has married him. The gambler decides to write off the debt when he learns that Abigail is the daughter of an old friend. But the gambler is murdered, and Ben appears to be involved.
metadata.Writer: Robert Libott, Frank Burt, Robert Carson
metadata.Actors: Ginger Rogers, Jack Carson, Joan Davis
